item.title: Bangalore to Tiruttani Solo Trip: Complete Travel Guide
item.description: Tiruttani is one of the most important pilgrimage destinations in Tamil Nadu and a sacred place deeply connected to the worship of Lord Murugan. The Tiruttani Murugan Temple stands on a hilltop blessed with centuries of faith, devotion and ancient history. For a solo traveler, the town offers a combination of calmness, spirituality, light trekking, cultural experiences and an escape from the rush
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
